pageSetting.title: 存量业绩认领明细分析

col.title: 支行实体行员人均余额
支行实体行员人均余额

select.isEqual: select a.jgdh ,a.jgmc ,a.zzhs ,a.rlhs ,a.zzhs-a.rlhs as wrlhs ,a.rlhszb ,a.clye ,a.sthyye ,a.clye-a.sthyye as xnhyye ,a.sthyyezb ,100-a.sthyyezb as xnhyyezb ,100-wrlhsyezb as rlhsyezb ,a.wrlhsyezb ,round(a.sthyye/b.jgsthyrs,2) as zhrjsthyye ,cast(b.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs ,a.khdxdh from ( select khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc,sum(zzhs) as zzhs ,sum(rlhs) as rlhs,round(cast(sum(rlhs) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zzhs) as decimal(17,2))*100,2) as rlhszb ,sum(zhye) as clye ,sum(sthyye) as sthyye ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(cast(sum(sthyye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100,2) end as sthyyezb ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(cast(sum(wrlhsye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100,2) end as wrlhsyezb from( select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,sum(case when sthybz=1 then gx.zlbl*zh.zhye*0.01 else 0 end) as sthyye ,case when max(sthybz)=1 then 1 else 0 end as rlhs ,case when max(sthybz)=0 then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join ( select gx.jxdxdh,gx.khdxdh,hy.hydh,gx.zlbl , case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as sthybz from dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx inner join khdx_hy hy on gx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where gx.jsrq=29991231 )gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' group by zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye union all select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else zh.zhye end as sthyye ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as rlhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' )a group by khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc )a inner join ( select jgkhdxdh as khdxdh,count(1) as jgsthyrs from khdx_jgcy cy inner join khdx_hy hy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' group by jgkhdxdh )b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh

select a.jgdh ,a.jgmc ,a.zzhs ,a.rlhs ,a.zzhs-a.rlhs as wrlhs ,a.rlhszb ,a.clye ,a.sthyye ,a.clye-a.sthyye as xnhyye ,a.sthyyezb ,100-a.sthyyezb as xnhyyezb ,100-wrlhsyezb as rlhsyezb ,a.wrlhsyezb ,round(a.sthyye/b.jgsthyrs,2) as zhrjsthyye ,cast(b.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs ,a.khdxdh from ( select khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc,sum(zzhs) as zzhs ,sum(rlhs) as rlhs,cast(sum(rlhs) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zzhs) as decimal(17,2))*100 as rlhszb ,sum(zhye) as clye ,sum(sthyye) as sthyye ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else cast(sum(sthyye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100 end as sthyyezb ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else cast(sum(wrlhsye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100 end as wrlhsyezb from( select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,sum(case when sthybz=1 then gx.zlbl*zh.zhye*0.01 else 0 end) as sthyye ,case when max(sthybz)=1 then 1 else 0 end as rlhs ,case when max(sthybz)=0 then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join ( select gx.jxdxdh,gx.khdxdh,hy.hydh,gx.zlbl , case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as sthybz from dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx inner join khdx_hy hy on gx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where gx.jsrq=29991231 )gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' group by zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye union all select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else zh.zhye end as sthyye ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as rlhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' )a group by khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc )a inner join ( select jgkhdxdh as khdxdh,count(1) as jgsthyrs from khdx_jgcy cy inner join khdx_hy hy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' group by jgkhdxdh )b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select a.jgdh ,a.jgmc ,a.zzhs ,a.rlhs ,a.zzhs-a.rlhs as wrlhs ,a.rlhszb ,a.clye ,a.sthyye ,a.clye-a.sthyye as xnhyye ,a.sthyyezb ,100-a.sthyyezb as xnhyyezb ,100-wrlhsyezb as rlhsyezb ,a.wrlhsyezb ,round(a.sthyye/b.jgsthyrs,2) as zhrjsthyye ,cast(b.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs ,a.khdxdh from ( select khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc,sum(zzhs) as zzhs ,sum(rlhs) as rlhs,round(cast(sum(rlhs) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zzhs) as decimal(17,2))*100,2) as rlhszb ,sum(zhye) as clye ,sum(sthyye) as sthyye ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(cast(sum(sthyye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100,2) end as sthyyezb ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(cast(sum(wrlhsye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100,2) end as wrlhsyezb from( select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,sum(case when sthybz=1 then gx.zlbl*zh.zhye*0.01 else 0 end) as sthyye ,case when max(sthybz)=1 then 1 else 0 end as rlhs ,case when max(sthybz)=0 then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join ( select gx.jxdxdh,gx.khdxdh,hy.hydh,gx.zlbl , case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as sthybz from dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx inner join khdx_hy hy on gx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where gx.jsrq=29991231 )gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' group by zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye union all select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else zh.zhye end as sthyye ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as rlhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' )a group by khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc )a inner join ( select jgkhdxdh as khdxdh,count(1) as jgsthyrs from khdx_jgcy cy inner join khdx_hy hy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' group by jgkhdxdh )b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh
select a.jgdh ,a.jgmc ,a.zzhs ,a.rlhs ,a.zzhs-a.rlhs as wrlhs ,a.rlhszb ,a.clye ,a.sthyye ,a.clye-a.sthyye as xnhyye ,a.sthyyezb ,100-a.sthyyezb as xnhyyezb ,100-wrlhsyezb as rlhsyezb ,a.wrlhsyezb ,round(a.sthyye/b.jgsthyrs,2) as zhrjsthyye ,cast(b.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs ,a.khdxdh from ( select khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc,sum(zzhs) as zzhs ,sum(rlhs) as rlhs,cast(sum(rlhs) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zzhs) as decimal(17,2))*100 as rlhszb ,sum(zhye) as clye ,sum(sthyye) as sthyye ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else cast(sum(sthyye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100 end as sthyyezb ,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else cast(sum(wrlhsye) as decimal(17,2))/cast(sum(zhye) as decimal(17,2))*100 end as wrlhsyezb from( select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,sum(case when sthybz=1 then gx.zlbl*zh.zhye*0.01 else 0 end) as sthyye ,case when max(sthybz)=1 then 1 else 0 end as rlhs ,case when max(sthybz)=0 then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join ( select gx.jxdxdh,gx.khdxdh,hy.hydh,gx.zlbl , case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as sthybz from dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx inner join khdx_hy hy on gx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where gx.jsrq=29991231 )gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' group by zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye union all select zh.jxdxdh,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh.zhye,1 as zzhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else zh.zhye end as sthyye ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end as rlhs ,case when hy.hydh like 'XN%' then zh.zhye else 0 end as wrlhsye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' )a group by khdxdh,jgdh,jgmc )a inner join ( select jgkhdxdh as khdxdh,count(1) as jgsthyrs from khdx_jgcy cy inner join khdx_hy hy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' group by jgkhdxdh )b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh ) t
